wikipedia_page.main: Sir Brian John Maynard Tovey  (15 April 1926 – 23 December 2015) was a British intelligence analyst who was director of the British signals intelligence agency, GCHQ, a post he held from 1978 to 1983.

response: * Sir Brian Tovey, former director of GCHQ
**Sir Brian Tovey, 89, civil servant, Director of the Government Communications Headquarters (1978–1983).
